import React from 'react' import classes from './CurrentElement.module.css' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { NewActiveSlideProduct,ChangeLengthSurfApparel } from '../../redux/ProductReducer'; import {ChangeUrl} from '../../redux/NavReducer' import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; const CurrentElement = (props) =>{ /*const handleChange = (e) =>{ props.ChangeLengthSurfApparel(e.target.value) }*/ let { slug } = useParams(), str = props.SurfProduct[Number(slug-1)] //img={str.img} Prise={str.Prise} Sale={str.Sale} text={str.text} id={str.id} //QuickOverview={str.QuickOverview} Availability={str.Availability} Small_img={str.Small_img} Star={str.Star} //{img:`https://cdn-5ca51fc3f911c91ddc742258.closte.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/wetsuit.jpg`,text:'Surf Apparel',Prise:'€.36.00',Sale:'',id:1, // QuickOverview:`Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. When an unknown printer took a galley of type.`, // Availability:'In stock',Size:29,Length:32, Small_img:`https://images.ua.prom.st/1606817428_w640_h640_gidrokostyum-tribord-olaian.jpg` } return

{str.text}

{str.Star}
1 Review(s)| Add Your Review
{str.Prise}
Product code: {str.Prise}
Availability: {str.Availability}
} const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return{ ActivePage:state.Products.ActivePageFromSurfApparel, SurfProduct:state.Products.SurfProduct, LengthSurfApparel:state.Products.LengthSurfApparel, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,{NewActiveSlideProduct,ChangeLengthSurfApparel,ChangeUrl})(CurrentElement)
